channel.title: Help with Range
channel.description:
Ok so I got the emote set for runecbow and its a wep now and everything, and also the Dbolt, ok the Dbolt goes into the right spot where its suppose too but heres my problem
The rune-cbow will shoot with out dbolts - how can I make so that it will not shoot without bolts
Also If you have bolts in your inv when you shoot them it does not leave your inventory like a rune arrow would if you shot it, any way too make it so they actually leave you range inventory everytime you shoot like mage bow and rune arrows?

item.title: Help with Range
item.dc:creator: @99_Clovers 99_Clovers
item.description:
@99_Clovers wrote:

Ok so I got the emote set for runecbow and its a wep now and everything, and also the Dbolt, ok the Dbolt
goes into the right spot where its suppose too but heres my problem

The rune-cbow will shoot with out dbolts - how can I make so that it will not shoot without bolts

Also If you have bolts in your inv when you shoot them it does not leave your inventory like a rune arrow would if you shot it, any way too make it so they actually leave you range inventory everytime you shoot like mage bow and rune arrows?
